驢唇不對馬嘴.pinyin: lu:2 chun2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3
驢唇不對馬嘴.definition: lit. a donkey's lips do not match a horse's mouth (idiom); fig. wide of the mark; irrelevant; incongruous

驢年馬月.definition: see 猴年馬月|猴年马月[hou2 nian2 ma3 yue4]

驢肝肺.definition: a donkey's liver and lungs; (fig.) ill intent

驢脣馬嘴.definition: see 驢唇不對馬嘴|驴唇不对马嘴[lu:2chun2 bu4 dui4 ma3zui3]
